Text:
Word about key shortcut "Z".
It's working only when cursor is in the middle of the screen (and U can see cursor only when u right-clict with Ur mouse). It shows U whole page.
Sometimes whe U run this program, whole page is show and U have to press "Z" to get back to normal view. 

That's all. Enjoy :)

Thank you Dramat, until now the only way for me to read the comics was converting cbr into rar files while i wasn't able to read cbz files.
Thanks to you i can now read all my comics
